sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; function PlaceOrder(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const items = useSelector(state => state.cart.products); const {shipping, paymentMethod} = useSelector(state => state.cart); const itemsHtml = items.map(item => { return {item.name} ${item.price} {item.qty} ${item.price * item.qty} }) const calculateTotal = () => { let total = 0; items.forEach((item) => { total += item.qty * item.price; }) return total; } return
Sign-in
Shipping
Payment
Place Order
Shipping Address

{shipping.address}

{shipping.city}

{shipping.postal}

{shipping.country}

Payment Method

{paymentMethod}

Cart

{paymentMethod}

{ itemsHtml.length > 0 ? {itemsHtml} : }
Name Price Qty Subtotal
Total: ${calculateTotal()} Checkout
Your cart is empty.
} export default PlaceOrder
